website_summaries.verdict: Designed specifically for beginners, these skate wheels have plenty of grip, but still roll smoothly. And the motion-activated LED lights can be turned off if they're too distracting for your child.
pros: Motion-activated LEDs with more than 500 hours of battery life
Solid urethane toe stops for fast and safe braking
Pure urethane wheels that are perfect for both indoor and outdoor skating
Collars are padded and boots are lined for comfort
cons: No toddler sizing, just child and youth

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE SKATES!! Holy COW THEYRE GREAT QUALITY FOR derby or otherwise!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a roller derby fanatic. I’m a younger gramma and a skater through and through.. I orderd these for my grandson and I’ll tell you what!!! WOW!!! Great Quality!! He hasn’t seen them yet as they’re for Christmas but just from what I’ve seen amazing quality for price!!! Blasting bright led lights, ridged grippy, yet durable as heartless wheels with super spin bearings, great hubs too, no less!! If you’re a derby gal, mom, aunt or uncle, dad, well you get the point... BUY THESE!!!!! Seriously!!! Buy these right here!!!! I CANNOT WAIT FOR CHRISTMAS JUST SO I CAN SEE HOM SKATE IN THESE. IF I CAN EDIT ILL ADD PHOTO LATER ON !! Thank you SO MUCH!!
customer_reviews.author: SStern

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved these skates ⛸ I don't have nothing bad to say about them
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Good roller skates
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these as the first roller skates for my 6 year old son. They were recommended as the first skates for beginners in one of the articles I saw on the Internet. We have no complaints, still learning to ride them :) We started with riding on the carpet and now practicing outside. They seem to be high quality and work as expected. Roll well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 9 yr old daughter loves these skates
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter for Xmas. She loves them! Seem to be well made and roll smoothly. More of a toy/beginner set of skates but I imagine easier to balance on then inline skates. Perfect for first timer or younger kids. If you are looking for race skates, probably not for you
customer_reviews.author: Sam I

customer_reviews.title: Way too small!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these skates for my grandson for Christmas. He wears a size 3 shoe. I ordered a size 4 in these skates. When I gave them to him for Christmas, they were way too small and now my window for returning them to Amazon is closed. You better order at least 2 sizes larger!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best roller skates ever!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these roller skates! Well made and very smooth. Comfortable as well. They light up which is a bonus. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my nephew’s birthday. He loved them! True to size and easy for him to get on and off. You can also turn the lights off which is a big plus for his mom!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Moore

customer_reviews.title: not just for boys!
customer_reviews.text: My God-daughter wanted roller skates that were not pink. These are super cute, not just for boys at all! They fit well and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi L

customer_reviews.title: Decent starter skate.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these skates for my son, he wears a size 4 shoe. He has wide feet, so I ordered a size 5 and he is comfortable. Not too tight. Just disappointed that one of the skates does not light up.
customer_reviews.author: Brambleshadow7

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson was thrilled when he received this and loved the lighted wheels. He is 6.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son likes them
customer_reviews.text: My son likes them and that's what was important for me.
customer_reviews.author: charlie harvey

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of starters skates!
customer_reviews.text: They were comfortable and cool looking even for an adult as myself.. the ridged tiresade skating so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Great Skates!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old son has been using these skates every Friday for the past 2 months and loves them. The wheels roll great, fit is perfect, and LEDs are super fun!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Twice purchased and it didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Second pair doesn’t work either. Light go off without you doing it yourself
customer_reviews.author: Dawn W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: 7 and 9 year old both loved them. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shalynn Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Short laces
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his skates the only thing I don't like are the laces are short
customer_reviews.author: Shanda

customer_reviews.title: Inside of tongues sharp against toes ~
customer_reviews.text: These look like really nice skates. I bought them for my granddaughter, but I've decided to return them instead. The problem is that the inside of the tongues curl downward toward the toes and would feel sharp and painful. I don't see that any other reviewers have had the same complaint, so this must not be a widespread issue.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

product_meta.title: Crazy Skates Flash Roller Skates for Boys - Light Up Skates with Ultra Bright Lights and Flashing Lightning Bolt - Black Patines
feature_bullets: ULTRA BRIGHT LIGHT UP SKATES - The skates feature motion activated LED lights that have over 500 hours of battery life! These colorful lights surround the bottom of the skate shoe so that they can be seen from all angles. The skate also features a bright flashing lightning bolt on the side for even more light up fun.
PERFECT FOR BEGINNERS - The skates can easily be adjusted by tightening for more stable movement while first learning and then loosened for better turning and agility as your child gains experience.
BUILT FOR SAFETY - Rest easy knowing that this quad skate features solid urethane toe stops for safe fast and efficient braking, unlike the cheap plastic parts found in some other skates.
HIGH PERFORMANCE - This skate features top quality components, including ABEC 3 full precision bearings and pure urethane wheels, that are perfect for both indoor rink use and outdoor street skating.
TOTAL COMFORT - The classic high-top sneaker style skates features soft padded collars and lined boots to ensure your child enjoys a super comfortable and supportive fit.
